Author: fishonthesun
Text: I agree with the other poster you can still tell him something you wanted to! Just say "I got a little blindsided and panicked a bit, but what I wanted to tell you was.... " I'm sure he will appreciate that very much

Author: DisturbedWeakness
Text: It's not to late to tell him you appreciated him telling you about his struggles. It's OK not to have all the answers ready when someone opens up to you. Taking some time and tell someone a little bit later that you appreciate their trust in you can't be a bad thing. Also, most people don't expect advice or really anything besides an ear when sharing something personal. It's OK not to have the right words to respond. :)
